description:
Your one-bag travel solution. The Black Hole MLC is a soft-sided suitcase with 3 carrying modes: backpack, shoulder bag and briefcase. Made of Patagonia’s bombproof Black Hole laminated polyester fabric, it'll get your goods through sardine-style luggage compartments and unpredictable in-transit weather, no problem. Opens like a book, holds 3–5 days of travel essentials and protects your 17in. laptop in a padded sleeve that can double as an organizer. And because it’s designed for maximum legal carry (MLC), it meets most airline carry-on requirements.

  • Fabric is recycled polyester ripstop laminated with TPU film and treated with a DWR finish
  • 3 carrying options: backpack style with ergonomic shoulder straps that tuck into a zippered compartment; shoulder-bag style with a comfortable shoulder strap; briefcase style with two carry handles
  • Main compartment opens like a book with a U-zip that wraps around 3 sides
  • Mesh dividers in the main compartment separate clean and dirty clothes, and compress stuff in place
  • External zippered pockets give you easy access to travel documents, wallet, phone and other essentials
  • Pass-through sleeve on the back lets you slip the MLC onto a rolling suitcase if you need more cargo space
  • Meets most carry-on size restrictions (check with your carrier for their specific rules)
name: Patagonia Black Hole MLC Travel Pack - Unisex
